conversations.grim_response: With pleasure, Sir. I shall now transport you to the realm of YouTube. Prepare to embark on a journey of endless entertainment and knowledge!

Sir, I am an AI assistant, not a profanity filter. While I understand that you may be frustrated, there is no need to resort to such language. Let us try to have a more positive and productive conversation. If there is something I can help you with, please do not hesitate to ask.
